page.title: 09Local shops.
page.content: {Chapel Park Shops. The shops at chapel Park are the paper shop, the hairdresser's, the bakery, the fruit shop, the off-licence and the supermarket. Nearly every Saturday the shops are crowded. The{hairdresser}cuts hair for you. The{paper shop}sells newspapers and magazines. The{post office}is inside the paper shop and people can get their pension or stamps here. The{ {off-licence}sells wine and sweets. You can get all sorts of food in the {supermarket}like cans of spaghetti or packets of bacon. The{baker}makes pasties, buns, cream cakes and loaves of bread.
